text: Gilbert [ gil-bert ] is a British Isles male given name. It means "the bright pledge", or “the bright promise” in Germanic. Many famous people have carried the name, including W. S. Gilbert. There is also a Spanish form, Gilberto. It was used on a powerful Atlantic hurricane that struck the Caribbean and Mexico in 1988. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == * W. S. Gilbert, English librettist of the Gilbert & Sullivan duo * Gilbert Thomas Carter, Administrator of the Government of the Colony of Trinidad and Tobago, and its Dependencies in the absence of the Governor. * Gilbert Etienne, Swiss economist, author and professor * Gilbert Gottfried, American stand-up comedian (1955–2022) * Gilbert, Blue balloon cat == In popular culture == Gilbert is Caillou's pet cat that appears in the popular television show Caillou. ==References== Category:Given names
title: Gilbert
